titleStmt.title: Junii 30. 1645. According to an order from the Honourable House of Commons to the Assembly of Divines, desiring them to set Tuesday the first of Iuly apart, and to appoint severall churches to meet in, to seek God for a blessing on our armies and forces now in the west, it is ordered by the Assembly ...
titleStmt.author: Westminster Assembly

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Adoniram Byfield, scriba.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
